## Generate listing tables
### Plain listing table
The following example generates a plain listing table for 5 patients.

```{r}
lst <- gen_plain_list("Patient", 5,
  num_cols = c("Age", "Weight", "Height"),
  cat_cols = c("Sex", "BMI"), date_cols = c("DOB", "Visit")
)

mtx_plain_list(list)
```
